scripts.husky:pre-commit:ts: npm run husky:pre-commit:ts --prefix packages/common && npm run husky:pre-commit:ts --prefix packages/api && npm run husky:pre-commit:ts --prefix packages/front
scripts.husky:pre-commit:test: npm run husky:pre-commit:test --prefix packages/common && npm run husky:pre-commit:test --prefix packages/api && npm run husky:pre-commit:test --prefix packages/front
scripts.husky:pre-commit:raw: npm run husky:pre-commit:lint && npm run husky:pre-commit:ts && npm run husky:pre-commit:test
scripts.husky:pre-commit: git stash -k && ( npm run husky:pre-commit:raw || true ) && (git stash pop || true)
scripts.hoist:prune: npm run hoist:prune:only && npm run hoist
scripts.prepare: node -e "try { require('husky').install(); } catch(e) { if(e.code !== 'MODULE_NOT_FOUND') throw e; }"
